author: kylem
msg: Initial (and not yet ccomplete) effort at a technical document describing the Controls runtime containment and composition model.   The current docs includes a description of the basic architecture and levels of functionality.   Still to be done are descriptions of specific individual container services.

Since it is still incomplete, I'm not linking into the main pages yet, but you can easily preview from an svn enlistment by: 1) cd to docs/forrest and do an "ant run" (starts Jetty), 2) browse to http://localhost:8888/controls/controlsContainment.html

author: stefan
msg: - reset updateable item state mgr in case an update operation fails

author: jm
msg: spamc -s doco made a little clearer
